title: Winter root vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '1 potato, peeled and cubed', '1 parsnip, peeled and cubed', '1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '1 yam, peeled and cubed', '1 fennel bulb, trimmed and cubed', '1L water, or as needed to cover', '2 chicken stock cubes', '120ml whipping cream', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon soured cream, divided']
